Interface Print

All Known Implementing Classes:
Assignment, Course, Queries
public interface Print
Interface Print contain methods that change the color of the text printed to console, pad Strings (for tables), and print tables to console easily.
Author:
Said

    • printTableLabels

      static void printTableLabels(String field2)

      Parameters:
      field2 - The name to be given to the 3rd column

    • printTable

      Prints table fields, used for tables with 2 columns --NOT CALLED ANYWHERE YET.
      Parameters:
      id - --first field (that is usually ID)
      field - --second field

    • printTable

      static void printTable(int id, String field, String field2)
      Prints table fields, used for tables with 3 columns --NOT CALLED ANYWHERE YET.
      Parameters:
      id - --first field (that is usually ID)
      field - --second field
      field2 - --third field
